name: Jelly Bear
description:
★★★★★ Thanks all your love to Jelly Bear. ★★★★★
★★★★★ Also get Jelly Bear HD for iPad! ★★★★★
Match jellies, bombs, and bears now and get addicted to Jelly Bear!

- Match as fast as you can to achieve high scores
- Match 5-in-a-row to create jelly bomb!
- Match 8-in-a-row to create jelly bear! Double and triple your scores!
- Clear a certain color by lucky draw while matching 10-in-a-row!

Features
- Stunning graphics
- 3 game modes
- 3 game board sizes
- Funny music and sound effects
- Weekly leaderboard for facebook friends
- GameCenter global leader boards and achievements

Follow Us
